title: Do we ever take enough time to thank Riot for their effort?
body: There are hundreds of people using their time and creativity to give us a game that is enjoyable (despite the toxic fanbase). I always see "rito why" or "wtf riot" but never a genuine "thanks rRiot". I mean look at the new Irelia rework. Just the trailer is enough to motivate me to buy her.  So I think we should take some time throughout our league careers and give Riot and their employees a thank you.
